name: vmwVmHbaTable
description: Table of host bus adapters (hba) for all vms in vmwVmTable.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.2.2.1.1.name: vmwHbaVmIdx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.2.2.1.1.description: This number corresponds to the vmwVmIdx in vmwVmTable.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.2.2.1.2.name: vmwVmHbaIdx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.2.2.1.2.description: Uniquely identifies a given Host Bus adapter in this VM. May change across system reboots.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.2.2.1.3.name: vmwHbaNum
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.2.2.1.3.description: The name of the hba as it appears in the VM Settings. VIM Property: Virtual Device index of 200-299. MOB: https://esx.example.com/mob/?moid=vmwVmIdx&doPath=config%2ehardware

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.2.2.1.4.name: vmwHbaVirtDev
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.2.2.1.4.description: The oem host bus adapter hardware being emulated to the Guest OS. MOB: Not visible.
